text: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon (15 January 1809 in Besançon – 19 January 1865 in Paris) was a French socialist, politician, economist and founder of Mutualism. He was the first to call himself an anarchist and is considered to by some to be the father of anarchism. title: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon
